readable.title: 3705430840_e108de78bf
readable.content: A balding man wearing blue is riding a unicycle on a paved road . A man in a blue shirt rides a unicycle on the street . A man riding a unicycle down a paved road A man wearing a blue checkered shirt rides a unicycle in the street . A man wearing a long sleeved blue shirt and jeans is riding a unicycle down a street .
